property.name: DefenderBriefing
property.value:
Some meddling Spheroid fools have launched a POLICING ACTION on a planet where you have been hiding out! Their goal will be to take your hard-won property (e.g. your units), but you have something different in mind. If you can manage to gain the upper hand, THEY will be the ones parting with the booty.

In the Periphery, turnabout is fair play!

OPERATION FEATURES:
* Center Deployment Chance: 33.3% -- pirates often succeed in landing without notice and ambush their targets

VICTORY CONDITIONS (Stand-Up Fight):
* Force opponent to surrender OR trigger auto-victory
* Auto-victory triggered when 1) 50% of enemy BV destroyed, and 2) friendly BV is 125% of enemy BV

BATTLE OUTCOMES:
* Land Exchange (None): No land exchange in the Policing operations
* Intelligence (Standard Defender): +1 Intel, if winner
* Influence (Standard Defender): 2000 BV: ~45 flu / 4000 BV: ~75 flu / 6000 BV: ~105 flu
* Operation Pay (MEDIUM): 2000 BV: ~3,264 CBills / 4000 BV: ~5,663 CBills / 6000 BV: ~8,063 CBills
* Loss Penalty: -20% if defeated -- standard loss penalty
* Stand Your Ground: ADDITIONAL -40% pay penalty for surrender before a **50% BV loss** -- pirates that surrender early don't get rewarded
* Salvage (Favorable to Winner): 60% friendly/60% enemy -- battle is on a remote Periphery planet, so winner has salvage advantage

***END BRIEFING***

property.name: AttackerBriefing
property.value:
You have launched a POLICING ACTION on a suspected pirate hideout. The purpose of this operation is capture the pirates' units, most likely ill-gotten gains plundered from the Inner Sphere. Make the pirates pay by destroying or capturing whatever units you can! Good luck, Commander!

OPERATION FEATURES:
* Edge Deployment Chance: 33.3% -- because this is a backwater planet, you may have landed without notice and have a good chance to ambush your target!

VICTORY CONDITIONS (Stand-Up Fight):
* Force opponent to surrender OR trigger auto-victory
* Auto-victory triggered when 1) 50% of enemy BV destroyed, and 2) friendly BV is 125% of enemy BV

BATTLE OUTCOMES:
* Land Exchange (None): No land exchange in the Policing operations
* Intelligence (None): No intel for attacker
* Influence (None): No influence for attacker
* Operation Pay (LOW): 2000 BV: ~2,720 CBills / 4000 BV: ~4,720 CBills / 6000 BV: ~6,720 CBills
* Loss Penalty: -20% if defeated -- standard loss penalty
* Stand Your Ground: ADDITIONAL -40% pay penalty for surrender before a **50% BV loss** -- Command will be displeased if you cut and run
* Salvage (Favorable to Winner): 60% friendly/60% enemy -- battle is on a remote Periphery planet, so winner has salvage advantage

***END BRIEFING***
